list.name: Communication
descriptions: Proven ability to convey complex ideas clearly and effectively, both verbally and in writing.

list.name: HTML/CSS
descriptions: Proficient in translating designs into responsive and accessible web interfaces, with a keen eye for detail in markup and styling.

list.name: SQL
descriptions: Experienced in crafting and optimizing queries, including subqueries and multiple joins, to efficiently retrieve and manipulate data.

list.name: NextJs
descriptions: In-depth understanding of server-side rendering and client-side JavaScript separation, enabling the development of high-performance React applications.

list.name: React
descriptions: Adept at utilizing React's component-based architecture to develop scalable and maintainable web applications.

list.name: React Native
descriptions: Skilled in leveraging React Native's capabilities to build cross-platform mobile applications.
Experienced in app compilation and publication on both App Store and Google Play Store.

list.name: Php Slim
descriptions: Competent in developing RESTful APIs using PHP Slim, ensuring robust and scalable backend solutions.

list.name: Wordpress
descriptions: Experienced in setting up and managing WordPress sites, including theme and plugin installation, customization, and development.
Able to configure Nginx for optimal performance.

list.name: NodeJs/Express
descriptions: Proficient in developing server-side applications with Node.js and Express, utilizing client-side JavaScript knowledge to create efficient and scalable services.

list.name: Java
descriptions: Familiar with Java programming, including the development of RESTful APIs and services interfacing with hardware components like Raspberry Pi serial ports.

list.name: C/C++
descriptions: Experienced in programming microcontrollers such as ESP32 and Arduino, focusing on IoT applications that require data processing and hardware interfacing.

list.name: Deployment
descriptions: Knowledgeable in version control systems, particularly in merging branches and resolving conflicts.
Experienced with Linux environments, hosting configurations, and environment setup.
